name: VRandish
description:
You're free to run around the vastness of the land without getting VR motion sickness.
This is an action game that extracts only battles from VR-MMORPG, which is planned to be developed separately.

▼ Controls


Move : Left stick ( Right stick for left-handed setting )
Turn : Right stick ( Left stick for left-handed setting )
Jump : Left trigger ( Right trigger for left-handed setting )

Weapon change (Sword) : B button ( Y button for left-handed setting )
Weapon change (Bow) : Y button ( B button for left-handed setting )
Arrow : Press and hold the A button, with the bow equipped. ( X button for left-handed setting )

Targeting : Press and hold Right grip button, and aim at the target. ( Left grip button for left-handed )

Controls : Menu button
